ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: But they were not sent as guardians over them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: But they were not Sent to be guardians over them!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: (they said so although) they had not been appointed watchers over them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: No one has appointed them to watch over the believers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Whereas they have not at all been sent as guardians over them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: But they were not sent as watchers over them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And they were not sent to be keepers over them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Yet they were not sent as watchers over them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Yet they were not sent as guardians over them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: though they were not sent to be their keepers --
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Whereas they were not sent over them as watchers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Though they were not sent to watch over them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: But they had not been sent as keepers over them!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: But they (disbelievers, sinners) had not been sent as watchers over them (the believers).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Yet they were not sent to be their guardians.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Yet they were not sent as guardians over them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: But they had not been sent as guardians over them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [83:33] God, exalted be He, says: Yet they, that is, the disbelievers, were not sent as watchers over them, [over] the believers, to preserve them or [to keep a record of] their deeds and thus guide them back to what is best for them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Yet they were not sent) they were not set upon the believers (as guardians over them) as guardians over them or over their works.
